content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=37-41, y=-83 to -87)
Complex mining setup consisting of:
- 4 Burner mining drills at positions (37.0,-85.0), (39.0,-85.0), (41.0,-83.0), (41.0,-86.0)
- Wooden chests at positions (34.5,-86.5), (36.5,-86.5), (39.5,-83.5), (40.5,-87.5)
- Burner inserters at positions (35.5,-86.5), (35.5,-85.5) connecting the mining drills to chests
All drills are currently out of fuel but positioned over coal resources

### Iron/Copper Ore Mining at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Mining setup with:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0) positioned over iron and copper ore
- Wooden chest at (-27.5,-59.5) collecting the ore
- Burner inserter at (-26.5,-59.5) moving ore from chest
- Stone furnace at (-27.0,-58.0) for smelting
- Output chest at (-24.5,-58.5) containing processed plates

### Iron Ore Mining Complex at position(x=-6 to -10, y=-57 to -60)
Large mining setup with:
- 3 Burner mining drills at (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), (-6.0,-59.0)
- Multiple wooden chests at (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5)
- Transport belt system connecting components
- All drills currently out of fuel but positioned over iron ore

### Smelting Array at position(x=0 to 6, y=0)
Large smelting setup with:
- 4 Stone furnaces at (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0)
- Input chests at (0.5,-2.5), (2.5,-2.5), (4.5,-2.5), (6.5,-2.5)
- Output chests at (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), (6.5,2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters managing input/output

### Power Generation Complex at position(x=-3.5 to 4.5, y=17.5 to 27.5)
Complete power generation setup:
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5) providing water
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0) heating water
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Electric poles creating power network

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to extract from invalid positions
- Cannot extract items from positions where no appropriate source exists
- Verify the position contains extractable resources before attempting extraction

### Entity fuel management issues
- Multiple burner mining drills and inserters are out of fuel
- Implement fuel distribution system to keep mining equipment operational
- Consider automating coal delivery to mining equipment

### Fluid system connectivity issues
- Some pipe networks show "no fluid present" warnings
- Ensure complete pipe connections between offshore pump, boiler and steam engine
- Check pipe network for any gaps or missing connections
